name: Big Challenge Golf: Tokyo Yomiuri Country Club Hen
overview: Tokyo Yomiuri Country Club golf course with stunning real 3D golf game with real Porigongurafikku faithfully reproduced. As well as accuracy and shot power and direction, emphasized the stance and grip styling, you can play more realistic feel. Big Challenge Golf - Tokyo Yomiuri Country Club Hen is a Golf game with a 3d polygon reproduction of one of Japan historic golf course, the Tokyo Yomiuri Country Club. Many of Japan's most special and historic golf courses lie within easy reach of Tokyo, so if you enjoy playing a round, make sure that you leave enough time for a few games. Close to Tokyo city centre, around the outskirts and outside of the city, golf courses often offer a peaceful alternative to hectic city life. Amongst the most noteworthy golf courses in the Tokyo area is the championship Yomiuri Country Club, which dates back to 1964 and is surrounded by mountainous scenery and valleys. Located in Metropolitan Tokyo, the Wakasu Golf Links is a fairly flat course and known for its challenging water hazards and sandy bunkers, while the nearby Kazusa Monarch Country Club is highly regarded amongst experienced players and was actually designed by Jack Nicklaus, welcoming visitors of all abilities. The game features 4 game modes (Stroke play, Match Play, Tournament & Training), different strokes, balls, clothes, shoes & gloves to choose.
